Name: Preboarding potential hire
Body:
# Preboarding

Resolve this ticket by executing the following steps:

### 2-3 weeks before onboarding date
- [x] Perform a criminal background check
- [x] Modify the appropriate work template in SharePoint under `/templates/employees/work_contracts/`
- [x] Send the work contract to the new employee w/ [onboardEmployeeEmail.txt](https://github.com/fusion-it/soc2-compliance/files/5772697/onboardEmployeeEmail.txt)
### Upon reception of the signed work contract
- [x] Store the signed work contract in SharePoint under `/employees/work_contracts/<firstName.lastName>.pdf`
-  Use a confidential label
- [x] Get the employee's handbook in SharePoint under /employees/employees_handbook.pdf
- [x] Send the employee's handbook to the employee w/ [onboardEmployeeEmail.txt](https://github.com/fusion-it/soc2-compliance/files/5772697/onboardEmployeeEmail.txt)
- [x] Make an introduction to staff of new hire w/ [onboardTeamEmail.txt](https://github.com/fusion-it/soc2-compliance/files/5772696/onboardTeamEmail.txt)
- [x] Access Comply's VM and execute  `comply proc onboard`
